title: Solve problem of trollers in matchmaking
body:
When I get people who rage and start the matchmaking with raging cause they are mad from a previous game, I just dont want them in my team.
It takes all my effort to keep them calm and 50% of the time they will keep raging in game.
If they dont just trollpick and start to feed midlane (even if they play well a Vi midlane with cleanse and ghost is not the ultimate teammate).

So Riot could you add a Vote system that the four other player can kick him out of game and give him a penalty? It's so frustrating to take one for the team and leave matchmaking and w8 and take punishment for other peoples bad behaviour.

So a Vote 4 man need to vote YES to kick someone from matchmaking? would that be too easy to abuse?
